issue.title: [Go][CSV] Custom csv.Writer formatter for boolean values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Existing implementation uses strconv.FormatBool to runs boolean values into the characters strings true or false (link <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/go/arrow/csv/writer.go#L87)>
 \* Provide override functionality to supply own formatter for booleans
 \* ability to output 1/0 instead of True/False

this should make the library more flexible with downstream consumers
